name: TransformedBag_transformedBagTest
description: Unit tests for the TransformedBag class, specifically focusing on the transformedBag method.

test_cases.name: testTransformedBagWithNonEmptyBag
test_cases.description: Tests the transformedBag method with a non-empty Bag, ensuring the transformer is applied correctly and the Bag is modified as expected.

test_cases.name: testTransformedBagWithEmptyBag
test_cases.description: Tests the transformedBag method with an empty Bag, ensuring no modifications are made to the Bag.
